_README: MALAZAN CHARACTER DATABASE - Edit this file to add/modify characters

_INSTRUCTIONS.how_to_add: Copy the TEMPLATE below, paste it into the 'characters' array, and fill in the information
_INSTRUCTIONS.affiliations: Separate multiple affiliations with commas: 'Bridgeburners, Malazan Army'
_INSTRUCTIONS.filters: Filters are AUTO-GENERATED from this data! Add new races/affiliations and they'll appear automatically
_INSTRUCTIONS.books: Add books as keys with arrays of events. Follow the pattern below.
_INSTRUCTIONS.sorting: Characters are automatically sorted alphabetically by name

_TEMPLATE.name: Character Full Name
_TEMPLATE.aliases: All nicknames, separated by commas or 'aka'

characters.name: Anomander Rake
characters.aliases: Son of Darkness, Lord of Moon's Spawn, Knight of Darkness
characters.appearance: Extremely tall (7+ feet), silver-haired, silver-skinned. Ageless and impossibly ancient. Eyes like pits of darkness. Wears black draconic armor.
characters.abilities: Soletaken (dragon form - black dragon). Master swordsman. Commands Kurald Galain (Elder Darkness). Nearly godlike power.
characters.weapons: Dragnipur - legendary sword that imprisons souls in a wagon pulling a gate
characters.god: Not a god but ascendant-level power. Son of Mother Dark
characters.relationships: Commands the Tiste Andii. Allied with Caladan Brood. Brother to Andarist and Silchas Ruin. Ancient relationship with Draconus.

Gardens of the Moon: Lords over Moon's Spawn floating fortress
Deadhouse Gates: Does not appear (storyline in Seven Cities)
Memories of Ice: Allies with the Malazans against Pannion Domin
Commands Tiste Andii in massive battles
Critical role in siege of Coral

characters.name: Apsalar
characters.appearance: Young woman from fishing village. Dark hair, pale skin. Haunted eyes from possession. Graceful, deadly movements.
characters.abilities: Possessed by Cotillion (Rope), master assassin skills remain. Enhanced reflexes and combat ability.
characters.god: Previously possessed by Cotillion, now free but retaining abilities
characters.relationships: Loved by Crokus/Cutter. Daughter to fisherman. Connected to Shadowthrone and Cotillion. Cared for by Fiddler and Kalam.

Gardens of the Moon: Freed from possession at book's end

characters.name: Antsy
characters.appearance: Bridgeburner sergeant. Nervous energy, hence the name. Fidgets constantly. Capable despite anxious demeanor.
characters.abilities: Experienced soldier and sergeant. Reliable despite nervous habits.
characters.relationships: Squad leader in Bridgeburners. Comrades with other veterans.

characters.name: Baudin
characters.appearance: Large, brutal-looking man. Criminal background. Surprisingly complex character beneath thuggish exterior.
characters.abilities: Exceptional fighter. Survival skills. Hidden depths of loyalty.
characters.relationships: Guards Felisin. Travels with Heboric. Loyal despite harsh appearance. Dies protecting Felisin.

Deadhouse Gates: Revealed as Claw agent on protection detail

characters.name: Blend
characters.appearance: Female Bridgeburner. Unremarkable appearance - her gift. Easy to overlook. Capable soldier.
characters.abilities: Supernatural ability to be overlooked and forgotten. Excellent infiltrator. Skilled soldier.
characters.relationships: Close to Picker. Part of Bridgeburner squads. Valued for unique abilities.

Gardens of the Moon: Uses her overlooked nature for scouting

characters.name: Caladan Brood
characters.race: Unknown (possibly T'lan Imass or ancient human)
characters.appearance: Massive warrior, towering and broad. Black-bearded. Ancient beyond measure. Wields a huge hammer.
characters.abilities: Immense physical strength. Commands earth magic. Nearly immortal. Master strategist.
characters.weapons: Huge two-handed hammer capable of shattering continents
characters.god: Allied with Burn (sleeping goddess of the earth)
characters.relationships: Allied with Anomander Rake. Commands armies against tyranny. Respectful relationship with Dujek.

Memories of Ice: Allies with Malazans against Pannion Domin
Hammer plays crucial role in finale

characters.name: Coll
characters.appearance: Nobleman of Darujhistan. Formerly wealthy, now less so. Still maintains nobility. Friend to outcasts.
characters.abilities: Combat capable. Political connections. Loyal friend.
characters.relationships: Close friend to Kruppe, Murillio, Rallick. Part of the city's hidden defenders.

characters.name: Coltaine
characters.appearance: Lean Wickan warrior. Weathered, tattooed face. Black hair with fetishes. Eyes like a raptor. Radiates command presence.
characters.abilities: Brilliant military commander. Master of cavalry tactics. Wickan warlock abilities.
characters.relationships: Commands the 7th Army. Respect from Duiker. Leads the Wickan clans. Connected to Sormo E'nath.

Deadhouse Gates: Leads the legendary Chain of Dogs
Protects tens of thousands of refugees
Crucified at Aren after heroic campaign
Memories of Ice: Does not appear (story in Seven Cities)

characters.name: Cotillion
characters.aliases: Rope, Dancer (former name), The Patron of Assassins
characters.appearance: Tall, lean figure dressed in black. Face often hidden. Moves with dancer's grace. Deadly elegance.
characters.abilities: God-level assassin. Master of shadow and stealth. Exceptional warrior. Commands Meanas.
characters.relationships: Partner to Shadowthrone. Former Dancer to Kellanved. Possessed Apsalar/Sorry. Connected to Apt. Allied with Quick Ben and Kalam.

Gardens of the Moon: Possesses Sorry to create perfect assassin
Deadhouse Gates: Gift of demon Apt to Crokus

characters.name: Crokus Younghand
characters.appearance: Young thief from Darujhistan. Lean, agile build. Dark hair. Transitions from boy to young man.
characters.abilities: Skilled thief and climber. Growing combat abilities. Courageous beyond his years.
characters.relationships: In love with Apsalar. Nephew of Mammot. Friend to Kruppe and Murillio. Uncle to Harllo.

Gardens of the Moon: Touched by Oponn (Lady and Lord of Chance)
Crucial role in events involving Coinspinner
Witnesses major events in the city
Deadhouse Gates: Travels with Apsalar, Fiddler, and Kalam

characters.name: Duiker
characters.appearance: Older man, weathered by campaigns. Grey-haired. Sharp, observant eyes. Scholar's bearing with soldier's experience.
characters.abilities: Historian, chronicler. Some basic Denul (healing) ability. Military tactical knowledge.
characters.relationships: Accompanies Coltaine. Friend to Kulp. Records the Chain of Dogs. Respected by soldiers.

Deadhouse Gates: Assigned to Seven Cities during Whirlwind Rebellion

characters.name: Dujek Onearm
characters.appearance: Grizzled veteran commander. Missing one arm. Grey-haired, scarred. Commands absolute respect. Wise, weathered features.
characters.abilities: Brilliant military strategist. Legendary commander. Tactical genius.
characters.relationships: Commands the Host. Father-figure to Whiskeyjack. Ally to Caladan Brood. Respected by Anomander Rake. Secretly still loyal to Laseen.

Memories of Ice: Deals with High Mage Tayschrenn's arrival

characters.name: Felisin Paran
characters.appearance: Young noblewoman turned hardened survivor. Once beautiful, scarred by slavery and durhang addiction. Transforms into fierce rebel leader.
characters.abilities: Becomes vessel for Whirlwind Goddess. Commands Apocalypse (fragment of Tellan Warren). Growing into powerful magical abilities.
characters.relationships: Sister to Ganoes Paran and Tavore Paran. Companions with Heboric and Baudin (deceased). Protected by Leoman and Toblakai.

Deadhouse Gates: Arrested and sent to Otataral mines
Leads the rebellion by book's end
Memories of Ice: Does not appear (but leads rebellion in background)

characters.name: Fiddler
characters.appearance: Weathered soldier with long mustache. Competent, reliable demeanor. Often carries his fiddle.
characters.abilities: Expert sapper (explosives). Skilled soldier. Talented musician. Some ability with Deck of Dragons.
characters.relationships: Close to Hedge (fellow sapper). Friends with Kalam. Part of Whiskeyjack's squad. Later serves under Tavore.

Gardens of the Moon: Witnesses major events in the city
Deadhouse Gates: Travels with Kalam, Crokus, and Apsalar
Experiences the Azath house in Tremorlor
Parts ways with companions at Aren
Memories of Ice: Returns to Bridgeburners for Pannion campaign
Survives Coral but witnesses devastating losses

characters.name: Ganoes Paran
characters.aliases: Captain Paran, Master of the Deck
characters.appearance: Young nobleman turned soldier. Noble features, lean build. Ages rapidly through experiences.
characters.abilities: Master of the Deck of Dragons. Touched by Oponn. Connected to Hood's Path. Extraordinary resilience.
characters.god: Touched by Oponn, connected to Hood. Master of the Deck.
characters.warren: Access to Hood's Path (Gate of Death)
characters.relationships: Brother to Whiskeyjack (estranged) and Tavore. Connected to Tattersail/Silverfox. Tool (complicated). Toc the Younger (friend).

Gardens of the Moon: Becomes Master of the Deck of Dragons

characters.name: Gruntle
characters.appearance: Caravan guard. Striped hair and skin markings after becoming Mortal Sword. Becoming tiger-like. Massive build.
characters.abilities: Extraordinary warrior blessed by Trake. Transforming into tiger aspect. Superhuman combat abilities. Soletaken (tiger).
characters.rank: Mortal Sword of Trake (Tiger of War)
characters.relationships: Protects caravans. Blessed/cursed by Trake. Partnership with Stonny and Harllo. Reluctant champion.

characters.name: Heboric Ghost Hands
characters.appearance: Former priest, had hands severed for thievery. Older man, tattooed across his body. Where his hands should be, spectral jade-green ghost hands appear.
characters.abilities: Scholar of ancient history. Ghost hands grant strange powers - can touch across time/space. Connected to ancient gods. Sees through Otataral.
characters.god: Former priest of Fener. Touched by Treach, Fener, and ancient Jade Giants.
characters.warren: Connected to Jade giants and ancient powers
characters.relationships: Travels with Felisin and Baudin. Connected to Fener (complicated). Guided by ancient spirits.

Deadhouse Gates: Imprisoned and sent to Otataral mines
Hands severed, replaced by ghost hands
Travels with Felisin across Seven Cities
Ghost hands manifest with strange powers
Touched by multiple gods and ancient forces

characters.name: Hedge
characters.appearance: Stocky sapper with wild hair. Always covered in soot and smelling of munitions. Cheerful despite dangerous profession.
characters.abilities: Master sapper and explosives expert. Fearless in combat.
characters.relationships: Best friend and sapper partner to Fiddler. Part of the Bridgeburners squad.

Gardens of the Moon: Serves as sapper in Darujhistan campaign
Memories of Ice: Dies heroically during the assault on Coral
Sacrifices himself to destroy Seerdomin forces

characters.name: Icarium
characters.appearance: Tall, grey-skinned with Jaghut features. Gentle manner belying terrible power. Ancient beyond measure. Wields a beautifully crafted bow.
characters.abilities: When enraged, becomes unstoppable destroyer. Can destroy entire civilizations. Creates magnificent mechanical works. Master warrior. Doesn't remember his rages.
characters.weapons: Composite bow of tremendous power, sword
characters.god: Not a god but possesses god-level destructive power when enraged
characters.relationships: Bound to Mappo Runt (guardian/companion). Searches for his own lost memories. Created the mechanisms in Tremorlor.

Deadhouse Gates: Travels across Seven Cities with Mappo
Encounters the Azath house at Tremorlor
His rage is nearly triggered multiple times
Ancient mechanisms at Tremorlor revealed as his work
Memories of Ice: His rage triggered during Pannion battles

characters.name: Iskaral Pust
characters.appearance: Seemingly mad, disheveled priest. Wild-eyed. Constantly muttering to himself. Covered in filth. Rides a mule named Mogora.
characters.abilities: High Priest of Shadow with significant power. Master of Meanas. Brilliant strategist hidden beneath madness. Can manipulate reality.
characters.relationships: Servant of Shadowthrone. Master of Tremorlor Azath House. Married to Mogora. Interacts with many travelers.

Deadhouse Gates: Provides crucial assistance while appearing mad

characters.name: Itkovian
characters.aliases: Shield Anvil of Fener, The Redeemer
characters.appearance: Knight in grey armor. Noble bearing. Sorrowful eyes that have seen too much. Pure heart.
characters.abilities: Shield Anvil - can absorb others' pain and suffering. Exceptional warrior. Absolute compassion.
characters.weapons: Sword, shield, armor of Shield Anvil
characters.affiliation: Grey Swords (mercenary company devoted to Fener)
characters.relationships: Commands Grey Swords. Takes on suffering of entire armies. Ultimate compassion incarnate.

Memories of Ice: Takes on suffering of dying and dead
Dies from bearing too much pain
One of the most heroic figures in series

characters.name: Kalam Mekhar
characters.appearance: Tall, dark-skinned Seven Cities native. Muscular build. Shaved head. Intense, intelligent eyes.
characters.abilities: Master assassin, exceptional fighter, Claw training. Can use Meanas (Shadow Warren) for stealth.
characters.relationships: Best friend to Quick Ben. Married to Minala. Close to Fiddler. Former Claw with complex past.

Gardens of the Moon: Part of Whiskeyjack's squad in Darujhistan

characters.name: Korlat
characters.appearance: Beautiful Tiste Andii woman. Silver skin, black hair. Ancient and elegant. Warrior's bearing with sorceress power.
characters.abilities: Powerful mage of Kurald Galain. Skilled warrior. Ancient Tiste Andii knowledge and abilities.
characters.relationships: Lover of Whiskeyjack. Sister to Orfantal and Hornet. Serves Anomander Rake. Connected to Silverfox.

Memories of Ice: Commands Tiste Andii forces in campaign
Deals with mortality of human lover
Connection to Silverfox and ancient history

characters.name: Kruppe
characters.appearance: Rotund, well-dressed man. Affects foppish manner. Kind, twinkling eyes. Always eating pastries.
characters.abilities: Far more than he appears. Master thief. Possible mage or touched by gods. Speaks in third person. Prophetic dreams.
characters.god: Connected to K'rul and Elder Gods
characters.relationships: Friend to Murillio, Coll, Rallick. Agent of unknown powers. Protector of Darujhistan.

Gardens of the Moon: Protects the city through mysterious means
Memories of Ice: Returns in service of mysterious purposes

characters.name: Kulp
characters.appearance: Weathered soldier-mage. Competent but not exceptional. Practical demeanor.
characters.abilities: Mage of Serc (Sky Warren). Adequate combat skills. Military experience.
characters.relationships: Accompanies Duiker. Friend to historian. Serves in 7th Army under Coltaine.

Deadhouse Gates: Dies heroically protecting refugees during Chain of Dogs

characters.name: Leoman
characters.appearance: Desert warrior. Lean, hard features. Carries flails. Intelligent, deadly, charismatic leader.
characters.abilities: Master warrior with flails. Desert survival. Brilliant tactician. Commands loyalty.
characters.relationships: Loyal to Sha'ik Reborn (Felisin). Commands respect. Allied with Toblakai. Deadly enemy of Empire.

Memories of Ice: Does not appear (leads rebellion in background)

characters.name: Lorn
characters.appearance: Tall, beautiful woman. Cold demeanor. Imperial bearing. Carries an Otataral sword.
characters.abilities: Exceptional warrior and commander. Wields Otataral sword that negates magic. Absolute loyalty to Empire.
characters.affiliation: Malazan Empire, directly serves Empress Laseen
characters.relationships: Serves Empress Laseen directly. Accompanied by Tool. Enemy of Bridgeburners. Worked with young Paran.

Gardens of the Moon: Hunts the Bridgeburners on Empress's orders
Seeks to prevent resurrection of Jaghut Tyrant

characters.name: Mallet
characters.appearance: Bridgeburner healer. Solid, dependable build. Calm demeanor essential for his role.
characters.abilities: Skilled healer using Denul Warren. Combat capable. Steady under pressure.
characters.relationships: Squad healer. Essential support to Bridgeburners. Trusted by all.

characters.name: Mappo Runt
characters.appearance: Massive Trell warrior. Grey-green skin, bestial features. Gentle eyes despite fearsome appearance. Ancient.
characters.abilities: Tremendous physical strength. Master warrior. Magical abilities related to earth. Bound by ancient vow.
characters.god: None, but bound by ancient vow
characters.relationships: Sworn guardian and only friend to Icarium. Prevents Icarium from learning his true nature. Tragic duty to protect world from his ward.

Deadhouse Gates: Protects Icarium from those who would use him
Prevents Icarium from remembering his rages
Memories of Ice: Suffers seeing his friend become destroyer

characters.name: Murillio
characters.appearance: Handsome nobleman and duelist from Darujhistan. Well-dressed, refined manner. Skilled with rapier.
characters.abilities: Master duelist. Charming, diplomatic. Some ability with Deck of Dragons.
characters.relationships: Friend to Kruppe, Rallick, Coll. Protector of Crokus. Part of Darujhistan's social elite.

characters.name: Picker
characters.appearance: Female Bridgeburner sergeant. Tough, capable, no-nonsense demeanor. Scarred veteran.
characters.abilities: Excellent soldier and squad leader. Tough as nails.
characters.relationships: Commands a squad. Close to other Bridgeburners. Respected by Whiskeyjack. Partner with Blend.

characters.name: Quick Ben
characters.aliases: Delat, The Wizard of Twelve Warrens
characters.appearance: Dark-skinned Seven Cities native. Lean, sharp features. Often appears unassuming but eyes betray intelligence.
characters.abilities: Master of multiple Warrens (claims 12, actually has access to more). Incredibly powerful mage. Expert at deception and misdirection.
characters.warren: Multiple: Meanas, Rashan, Thyr, Telas, Mockra, D'riss, Denul, and others
characters.relationships: Best friend to Kalam. Close to Whiskeyjack. Cautious around Tayschrenn. Allied with Shadowthrone and Cotillion.

Gardens of the Moon: Serves as squad mage in Darujhistan campaign
Faces off against multiple powerful mages
Crucial role in stopping the Jaghut Tyrant
Memories of Ice: Key magical support in Pannion Domin campaign
Instrumental in battles at Capustan and Coral
Witnesses the summoning of the Crippled God's influence

characters.name: Rallick Nom
characters.appearance: Assassin from Darujhistan. Dark clothing, quiet demeanor. Deadly efficient.
characters.abilities: Master assassin. Expert with various weapons. Stealth and infiltration specialist.
characters.relationships: Friend to Kruppe and Murillio. Complex relationship with Vorcan. Love interest in city.

characters.name: Shadowthrone
characters.appearance: Shrouded in shadows, difficult to perceive clearly. Tall, robed figure. Eyes glint with ancient cunning.
characters.abilities: God-level power over shadow. Master manipulator. Commands Kurald Emurlahn. Brilliant strategist.
characters.relationships: Partner to Cotillion. Former Emperor of Malaz with Dancer. Allied with Quick Ben. Schemer against all other gods.

Gardens of the Moon: Works against Laseen and other Ascendants

characters.name: Silverfox
characters.aliases: Nightchill and Tattersail Reborn, The Summoner
characters.appearance: Young girl-woman with silver hair. Ancient eyes in young face. Possesses three souls' memories. Appears as teenager but holds millennia of knowledge.
characters.abilities: Commands the T'lan Imass as Summoner. Access to Tellann and other ancient powers. Memories of Tattersail, Nightchill, and original Silverfox.
characters.weapons: Command of T'lan Imass, ancient magic
characters.god: Not a god but commands ancient undead race
characters.relationships: Tattersail's soul merged with Nightchill. Paran (complicated). Tool (complex). Whiskeyjack (as Tattersail's memory). Korlat (ancient connection).

Memories of Ice: Critical role in war against Pannion
Deals with three sets of memories

characters.name: Spindle
characters.appearance: Bridgeburner squad mage. Nervous disposition. Quick movements and speech.
characters.abilities: Squad-level mage. Capable with various Warrens. Adequate combat skills.
characters.relationships: Squad mage for Bridgeburners. Works with other squad members.

characters.name: Tattersail
characters.appearance: Large-bodied woman, overweight but powerful. Kind eyes. Later reborn as young girl with silver hair.
characters.abilities: Powerful mage of Thyr (fire). In death, soul merged with others to become Silverfox (Summoner).
characters.affiliation: Malazan Army, later T'lan Imass (as Silverfox)
characters.god: None originally. As Silverfox, connected to T'lan Imass
characters.relationships: Loved by Bellurdan. Connected to Hairlock. Reborn with Nightchill's soul and Tattersail's memories. Ganoes Paran (complicated).

Gardens of the Moon: Serves as cadre mage in Pale and beyond
Soul preserved by Quick Ben's ritual
Deadhouse Gates: Emerges as young girl with ancient knowledge

characters.name: Tavore Paran
characters.appearance: Emotionless, cold exterior. Noble bearing. Thin, severe features. Wields an Otataral sword like Lorn before her.
characters.abilities: Brilliant military commander. Exceptional with Otataral sword. Strategic genius. Absolutely disciplined.
characters.relationships: Sister to Ganoes Paran and Felisin Paran. Commands the Bonehunters (14th Army). Distant from family. Absolute loyalty to Empress.

characters.name: Tayschrenn
characters.appearance: Bald, powerful build. Intimidating presence. Scarred from magical combat. Cold, calculating eyes.
characters.abilities: Enormously powerful High Mage. Master of Thyr and other Warrens. Second only to Empress in Imperial hierarchy.
characters.rank: High Mage of the Malazan Empire
characters.affiliation: Malazan Empire, loyal to Empress Laseen
characters.relationships: Serves Empress Laseen. Complex relationship with Bridgeburners. Feared by most. Quick Ben is wary of him. Dujek works with him pragmatically.

Memories of Ice: More complexity to his character revealed
Critical role in battles at Coral

characters.name: The Pannion Seer
characters.appearance: Young man possessed by ancient entity. Eyes vacant yet terrifying. Speaks with voice of thousands.
characters.abilities: Immense magical power. Commands armies of the insane. Corrupts and dominates minds. Connected to Crippled God.
characters.weapons: Mind control, massive magical power, undead armies
characters.god: Avatar of aspect of the Crippled God
characters.relationships: Commands Seerdomin. Master of Pannion Domin. Enemy of all free peoples.

Memories of Ice: Commands massive armies of the mad
Revealed as fragment of Crippled God

characters.name: Toc the Younger
characters.appearance: Young scout with one eye. Lean, capable build. After possession - transformed into Seerdomin with restored eyes and terrible power.
characters.abilities: Excellent scout and archer before possession. As Seerdomin - undead powers and command over Seer's forces.
characters.weapons: Bow, later Seerdomin weapons and magic
characters.relationships: Son of Toc the Elder. Friend to Paran, Tool, and others. Tragic fate of possession and transformation.

Gardens of the Moon: Loses an eye in Pale disaster
Deadhouse Gates: Growing friendship with the T'lan Imass
Memories of Ice: Tool forced to face possessed Toc

characters.name: Tool
characters.appearance: Desiccated undead warrior. Ancient stone sword. Ritualistic armor and wrappings. Flint eyes.
characters.abilities: T'lan Imass powers - immunity to most damage, ancient warrior skills, Tellann Warren access.
characters.rank: First Sword of the T'lan Imass
characters.relationships: Accompanies Toc the Younger. Connection to Silverfox. Mentor to various humans. Eventually seeks to break the Ritual.

Memories of Ice: Complex relationship with Toc the Elder

characters.name: Trotts
characters.appearance: Large Barghast warrior with ritual scars and filed teeth. Intimidating presence.
characters.abilities: Exceptional warrior. Barghast combat skills.
characters.relationships: Member of Whiskeyjack's squad. Respected by fellow Bridgeburners.

characters.name: Whiskeyjack
characters.appearance: Tall, lean, weathered soldier in his forties. Dark hair with grey streaks. Carries himself with quiet authority.
characters.abilities: Master tactician and swordsman. Former military commander.
characters.relationships: Commands the Bridgeburners. Close to Korlat (Tiste Andii). Brother to Ganoes Paran (estranged). Friend to Dujek Onearm.

Gardens of the Moon: Commands the Bridgeburners in Darujhistan campaign
Works to prevent war in Darujhistan
Memories of Ice: Leads Bridgeburners in campaign against Pannion Domin
Faces the Seer and his armies
Deals with the revelation of Silverfox's identity
Witnesses the devastating losses at Coral

characters.name: Keneb
characters.appearance: Capable officer with weathered features. Determined expression. Shows intelligence and tactical awareness.
characters.abilities: Solid military commander. Tactical competence. Leadership skills.
characters.relationships: Serves under Coltaine. Brother to Selv. Protects his family during Chain of Dogs. Later serves under Tavore.

characters.name: Gesler
characters.appearance: Grizzled veteran sergeant. Tanned, weathered skin with almost golden hue. Tough survivor.
characters.abilities: Exceptional soldier and leader. Survival expert. Touched by Fener's fire - unusual resilience.
characters.relationships: Close to Stormy and Truth. Commands respect from his squad. Survives Chain of Dogs.

Deadhouse Gates: Travels with Stormy and Truth (Hound of Shadow)
Revealed to be touched by Fener's fire

characters.name: Stormy
characters.appearance: Large, powerful soldier. Red-haired. Fierce warrior. Golden-hued skin like Gesler.
characters.abilities: Powerful warrior. Touched by Fener's fire - enhanced resilience. Berserker in battle.
characters.relationships: Serves with Gesler. Close bond. Both fire-touched. Protects Truth.

Deadhouse Gates: Touched by Fener's fire - golden skin

characters.name: Truth
characters.appearance: Massive hound, one of the Hounds of Shadow. Damaged and weakened but still formidable. Black fur.
characters.abilities: Hound of Shadow - supernatural strength, speed, and senses. Warren travel. Intelligent.
characters.affiliation: House of Shadow, protected by Gesler and Stormy
characters.relationships: Protected by Gesler and Stormy. One of Shadowthrone's Hounds. Injured but recovering.

Gardens of the Moon: Appears as one of the Hounds of Shadow
Deadhouse Gates: Badly injured, found by Gesler and Stormy
Protected by the soldiers during Chain of Dogs

characters.name: Lostara Yil
characters.appearance: Beautiful Seven Cities woman. Red Blade warrior. Dark hair, fierce eyes. Lethal grace.
characters.abilities: Elite Red Blade assassin. Exceptional warrior and tracker. Otataral sword wielder.
characters.affiliation: Red Blades, later serves Adjunct Tavore
characters.relationships: Hunts Pearl (Claw). Complex relationship develops. Serves Tavore. Connected to Pearl's mission.

characters.name: Pearl
characters.appearance: Lean, dangerous Claw agent. Sharp features. Moves with deadly grace. Always alert.
characters.abilities: Master Claw assassin. High-level mage. Expert at stealth, infiltration, assassination. Meanas Warren mastery.
characters.relationships: Hunted by Lostara Yil. Forms complex alliance with her. Serves Empress Laseen. Works with Tavore.

Deadhouse Gates: Claw agent operating in Seven Cities
Uses Meanas for stealth and survival

characters.name: Blistig
characters.appearance: Military commander with hard features. Competent but not exceptional. Political awareness.
characters.abilities: Capable military officer. Standard commander skills.
characters.relationships: Serves under Coltaine during Chain of Dogs. Later serves Tavore. Survivor of the ordeal.

characters.name: Nok
characters.appearance: Weathered naval commander. Grey-bearded veteran. Commands respect through competence.
characters.abilities: Master naval tactician. Experienced fleet commander.
characters.relationships: Commands Malazan fleet. Works with Tavore. Crucial in Seven Cities operations.

Deadhouse Gates: Commands Malazan fleet in Seven Cities

characters.name: Cuttle
characters.appearance: Grizzled sapper. Scarred from munitions work. Competent, reliable demeanor.
characters.abilities: Expert sapper and demolitions specialist. Experienced soldier.
characters.relationships: Works with other sappers. Part of military operations in Seven Cities.

characters.name: Nether
characters.appearance: Young Wickan witch. Tribal tattoos and fetishes. Intense, focused. Twin to Nil.
characters.abilities: Wickan witchcraft and spirit magic. Growing powers. Can sense spirit world.
characters.relationships: Twin sister to Nil. Serves with Coltaine. Connected to Wickan spirits. Sormo E'nath mentors both twins.

Deadhouse Gates: Young Wickan witch with Chain of Dogs

characters.name: Nil
characters.appearance: Young Wickan warlock. Tribal markings. Intense presence. Twin to Nether.
characters.abilities: Wickan warlock powers. Spirit magic. Growing magical abilities.
characters.relationships: Twin brother to Nether. Serves with Coltaine. Mentored by Sormo E'nath. Connected to Wickan ancestors.

Deadhouse Gates: Young Wickan warlock with Chain of Dogs

characters.name: Kamist Reloe
characters.appearance: Powerful Seven Cities mage. Arrogant bearing. Commanding presence.
characters.abilities: High Mage with considerable power. Master of multiple Warrens. Tactical magic use.
characters.relationships: Serves Korbolo Dom and the rebellion. Key magical support for rebel armies. Enemy of the Empire.

Deadhouse Gates: Provides magical support to rebel forces

characters.name: Korbolo Dom
characters.appearance: Former Malazan Fist. Powerful build. Ambitious, ruthless features. Commanding presence.
characters.abilities: Brilliant military commander. Tactical genius. Utterly ruthless. Political manipulator.
characters.relationships: Betrayed the Malazan Empire. Commands rebel armies. Works with Kamist Reloe. Enemy of Coltaine and all Malazans. Hated as traitor.

Deadhouse Gates: Commands rebel forces against Chain of Dogs

characters.name: Loric
characters.appearance: Malazan High Mage. Composed, professional demeanor. Shows competence and experience.
characters.abilities: High Mage with considerable power. Multiple Warren access. Combat magic specialist.
characters.relationships: Serves with Malazan forces. Works alongside other High Mages. Professional relationship with command.

characters.name: Febryl
characters.appearance: Scheming mage in Seven Cities. Cunning features. Political operator.
characters.abilities: Mage with political cunning. Manipulator. Self-serving strategist.
characters.relationships: Manipulates events in Seven Cities. Works with but distrusts rebellion leaders. Self-interested schemer.

Deadhouse Gates: Plays various factions against each other

characters.name: Bidithal
characters.appearance: Twisted, corrupt priest. Physically and morally deformed. Predatory and vile.
characters.abilities: High Priest with significant magical power. Utterly corrupt. Manipulates faith.
characters.relationships: Serves Sha'ik Reborn. Corrupt influence on rebellion. Universally distrusted. Predatory toward vulnerable.

characters.name: Karsa Orlong
characters.appearance: Massive warrior, over 7 feet tall. Bronze skin, filed teeth. Primitive but learning. Immense physical presence.
characters.abilities: Superhuman strength and endurance. Master of violence. Growing intelligence. Unbreakable will. Learning civilized ways.
characters.god: Rejects all gods. 'I am Karsa Orlong. I will witness.'
characters.relationships: Traveled with Delum Thord and Bairoth Gild. Enslaved. Vows to destroy civilization. Complex relationship with 'lowlanders.'

characters.name: Pella
characters.appearance: Young soldier. Eager, capable. Shows promise.
characters.abilities: Developing soldier skills. Learns quickly. Loyal.
characters.relationships: Serves with various squads. Learns from veterans.

characters.name: Delum Thord
characters.appearance: Large Teblor warrior. Bronze skin, filed teeth. Massive build. Brain damaged from head wound.
characters.abilities: Once powerful warrior. Now diminished mentally but still physically strong.
characters.relationships: Friend to Karsa Orlong and Bairoth Gild. Suffers brain injury. Protected by Karsa after injury.

characters.name: Bairoth Gild
characters.appearance: Large Teblor warrior. Bronze skin, filed teeth. Powerful and proud.
characters.abilities: Powerful Teblor warrior. Exceptional strength and combat skills.
characters.relationships: Friend to Karsa Orlong and Delum Thord. Traveled on raid together. Dies during journey.
